metadata.title: CVE-2021-45482 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.description:
In WebKitGTK before 2.32.4, there is a use-after-free inWebCore::ContainerNode::firstChild, a different vulnerability thanCVE-2021-30889.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-45482` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.0 - 2.33.90-1ubuntu1
gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.1 - 2.33.90-1ubuntu1
gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-5.0 - 2.33.90-1ubuntu1
gir1.2-webkit2-4.0 - 2.33.90-1ubuntu1
gir1.2-webkit2-4.1 - 2.33.90-1ubuntu1
gir1.2-webkit2-5.0 - 2.33.90-1ubuntu1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-18 - 2.33.90-1ubuntu1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-bin - 2.33.90-1ubuntu1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.1-0 - 2.33.90-1ubuntu1
libjavascriptcoregtk-5.0-0 - 2.33.90-1ubuntu1
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37 - 2.33.90-1ubuntu1
libwebkit2gtk-4.1-0 - 2.33.90-1ubuntu1
libwebkit2gtk-5.0-0 - 2.33.90-1ubuntu1
webkit2gtk-driver - 2.33.90-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: webkit2gtk package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.33.90-1ubuntu1').
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
